page.title: 07LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: Football Manager and Bruce Lee. Most adults invite their friends into their house to have dinner or parties or watch a video.Church members can go to the women's guild or the men's assocation.There is also a branch of W.R.I.The sports available are bowls,tennis,golf and amateur football.Eaglesham is a country area with a very popular angling club called the Eaglesham Angling Association which fishes in waters called Loch Goin,Picket Law and Corse House Reservoir where they fish for brown trout.There are 130 members who catch about 1000 fish a year.Many men have guns and are members of the local clay pigeon shooting club.They also use their guns for rabbitting and shooting crows.Unfortunately some young people shoot other birds and many lapwings have disappeared.
